description: This file defines a React component called RequireAuth, which acts as a route guard to ensure that only authenticated users can access certain routes. It uses react-router-dom's useLocation hook to redirect unauthenticated users to the login page, passing the original location for redirecting back after login.

methods.name: RequireAuth({ user, children })
methods.description: A React component that conditionally renders its children if the user is authenticated; otherwise, it redirects to the login page.
